##First Contact

These functions are a convenient way to verify a connection to Cytoscape and for logging the versions of RCy3 and Cytoscape in your scripts.
```{r}
library(RCy3)

# Test the connection to Cytoscape.
cytoscapePing()
```

```{r}
# Check the version
cytoscapeVersionInfo()

```
